chooseEquipment.text: Click on the Random Table links to get money and a Kai Weapon before continuing

numberPicker.text: You may choose the number of Gold Crowns to exchange for Ren

message.text: You may take up to five of the following (all meals count as one object):
Drop 1 Weapon and 1 Backpack Item before continuing
Drop 1 Weapon or 1 Backpack Item before continuing

numberPicker.text: Choose the number of Gold Crowns to exchange for Lune
Choose the number of Gold Crowns to exchange for Sheasu Torqs
Choose the total number of Gold Crowns you are willing to give
Choose the number for the combination lock
Choose the number for the combination lock
Choose the total number of Gold Crowns you are willing to give

message.text: Drop 1 Special Item, 1 Weapon, and 2 Backpack Items before continuing

numberPicker.text: Choose the number for the combination lock
